      "text": "Hi, I’m one of the emergency room doctors. I understand you were getting an extra dialysis session today and started feeling very short of breath and light‑headed, and your blood pressure was low. Can you tell me in your own words what’s been going on over the last few days?",

      "speaker": "PATIENT",
      "relative_time": "H-05:38",

    {
      "turn_id": 3,
      "speaker": "RESIDENT",
      "relative_time": "H-05:35",

      "speaker": "PATIENT",

      "evidence_eids": ["DS#000001"]

    {
      "turn_id": 5,
      "speaker": "RESIDENT",
      "relative_time": "H-05:30",
      "text": "You also have a right groin dialysis catheter in place, and I see notes that you’ve had problems with clots in your central veins before, which made placing lines in your neck difficult.       "turn_id": 7,
      "speaker": "RESIDENT",
      "relative_time": "H-05:10",

      "turn_id": 8,
      "speaker": "PATIENT",
      "relative_time": "H-05:08",

    "one_paragraph_summary": "During this admission, a middle‑aged woman with HIV off HAART and ESRD on hemodialysis presented after an extra dialysis session with exertional shortness of breath and symptomatic hypotension, likely from excessive ultrafiltration.
